document_data.name: North Wind's Fury
document_data.mainbody: The '''''North Wind's Fury''''' was the pirate vessel of the [[Corsair (kit)|corsair]] [[Makbulla bint Dalmar]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: ''North Wind's Fury'' was a 70 ft. (21 m) long ''[[sambuk]]'' crewed by 40 hardened [[dwarves]].
document_data.Activities: Makbulla primarily hunted the waters around the [[Pearl Cities]] and the [[Pantheist League]].
